Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's worth more than $120 to us. I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone like you who appreciates quality and excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits this product has to offer! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
